game.name: The Lists VR
game.categories: Single-player, VR Only, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mount your horse, lower your lance, and experience the thrill of medieval jousting in full virtual reality. The Lists VR puts you directly on the tournament field in 15th-century Europe. Compete in a focused, skill-based jousting experience where your body becomes the controller.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mount your horse, lower your lance, and experience the thrill of medieval jousting in full virtual reality. The Lists VR puts you directly on the tournament field in 15th-century Europe. Compete in a focused, skill-based jousting experience where your body becomes the controller.
